About.hero_subtitle: Phangan Aura brings the island's best therapists directly to your villa. Experience luxury spa treatments in the privacy and comfort of your own space.
About.philosophy_text_1: We believe that true relaxation happens when you don't have to rush. No traffic, no waiting rooms, just pure bliss in your personal sanctuary. Our team consists of certified, experienced therapists who are passionate about healing and well-being.
About.philosophy_text_2: From traditional Thai massage to rejuvenating facials, we use only premium organic products sourced locally from Koh Phangan.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our mobile spa service.

how_it_works.q: How does the mobile service work?
how_it_works.a: You book online, and our therapists come to your villa or hotel with all necessary equipment (massage table, towels, oils).

areas.a: We serve the entire island of Koh Phangan.

payment.a: You can pay securely online via credit card or in cash directly to the therapist.

cancellation.a: You can cancel for free up to 24 hours before your appointment.

preparation.q: Do I need to prepare anything?
preparation.a: No, we bring everything. Just ensure there is enough space for a massage table.

products.a: We use high-quality, organic, and locally sourced products whenever possible.
